snippet: The Federal Communications Commission has ruled that Google "deliberately impeded and delayed" an investigation of data collection for its StreetView service, which swept up sensitive personal information from wireless home networks.
abstract: The Federal Communications Commission has ruled that Google "deliberately impeded and delayed" an investigation of data collection for its StreetView service, which swept up sensitive personal information from wireless home networks.

headline.main: F.C.C. Fines Google for Blocking Inquiry
